Oct. 2, 2010 D West Wales BBA Contest (Fourth Section)
West Wales BBA Festival Contest (Fourth Section) 40 Own Choice Test Piece Contest West Wales BBA Festival Contest west-wales-bba-festival-contest-fourth-section
None
Ammanford, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK Best instrumentalist - Terry Wells (euphonium) Oakdale. Prizes - 1st £200, 2nd £125, 3rd £100. 5 bands competed.
Oct. 3, 2010, 12:46 p.m. July 4, 2020, 11:55 a.m.
1 Severn Tunnel Band Alex McGee
2 Abertillery & District Youth Dean Evans
3 Melingriffith 2 Band Dewi Griffiths
4 Cwmbran Band Andrew Lucas
5 Oakdale Silver Band Adrian Browning
